text: Otto Geisert (18 November 1939 â€“ 8 January 2021) was a German footballer. He spent seven seasons in the Bundesliga with Karlsruher SC and 1. FC Kaiserslautern. He was born in Nordhorn, Germany. Geisert died, aged 81, in Kaiserslautern, Germany. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German footballers
title: Otto Geisert
